name: again-faster-theme-shopify
description: A theme for Again / Faster store

scripts.git: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.git-minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.git-major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && git add . && git commit -m

author: Davlatyor Botirbaev
